resources.string: Experience service like no other. Infinity is about world-class service. Services made with your lifestyle in mind.

A team of dependable IMOs are available for network/mobile phone assistance with services such as text broadcasts, transferring contacts, photos and messages from old phones to new ones, technical mobile concerns, and plan requirements
An exclusive hotline dedicated for Infinity subscribers all your local and international lifestyle needs, and international medical and travel assistance.
For inquiries and concerns. Infinity subscribers have a hotline readily accessible, 24/7. You may dial *800 from your Infinity handset to get in touch with dependable representatives
